body_html: It looks like you're trying to take gradients of values inside the loop w.r.t. tensors that are outside the loop, e.g. through the body arguments. Is that right? This isn't supported. I think next version of TF will give a clearer error message.
body_text: It looks like you're trying to take gradients of values inside the loop w.r.t. tensors that are outside the loop, e.g. through the body arguments. Is that right?  This isn't supported. I think next version of TF will give a clearer error message.
body: It looks like you're trying to take gradients of values inside the loop w.r.t. tensors that are outside the loop, e.g. through the body arguments. Is that right?  This isn't supported. I think next version of TF will give a clearer error message.
